mapper.sql: COMPANY_NUM, COMPANY_KIND, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_PW, COMPANY_BN, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_CAP, COMPANY_PH, COMPANY_EMAIL, MANAGER_NAME, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_BANK, COMPANY_ACC, COMPANY_STATUS
DO_NUM, HOST_NUM, DO_NAME, DO_START_DATE, DO_END_DATE, DO_OPEN_DATE, DO_CLOSE_DATE, DO_PP, DO_NOWPP, DO_DETAIL, DO_OPT_GENDER, DO_OPT_AGE, DO_STATUS
CASHIN_NUM, PAY_NUM, COMPANY_NUM, CASHIN_TOTAL_PRICE, CASHIN_COMMISSION, CASHIN_BALANCE, CASHIN_DAYS, CASHIN_MONTH, CASHIN_STATUS
BUY_NUM, DO_NUM, PAY_NUM, HOST_NUM, GOODS_NUM, COMPANY_NUM, MAP_L_NUM, MAP_M_NUM, MAP_S_NUM, THEME_L_NUM, THEME_M_NUM, THEME_S_NUM, BUY_QTY, BUY_START_DATE, BUY_END_DATE, BUY_DAYS, BUY_PRICE
GOODS_NUM, MAP_L_NUM, MAP_M_NUM, MAP_S_NUM, THEME_L_NUM, THEME_M_NUM, THEME_S_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DETAIL, GOODS_DANGER, GOODS_STATUS, GOODS_STOCK, COMPANY_NUM, REG_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into company (COMPANY_NUM, COMPANY_KIND, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_PW, COMPANY_BN, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_CAP, COMPANY_PH, COMPANY_EMAIL, MANAGER_NAME, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_BANK, COMPANY_ACC, COMPANY_STATUS) values ('CO'|| COMPANY_NUM_seq.nextval, #{companyKind},#{companyId},#{companyPw}, #{companyBn}, #{companyName}, #{companyCap},#{companyPh}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerName}, #{companyAddr},#{companyBank},#{companyAcc},#{companyStatus} )
mapper.select:
select
from company where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} and COMPANY_PW = #{companyPw}

select k.DO_NUM,k.HOST_NUM,DO_NAME,DO_START_DATE,DO_END_DATE,DO_OPEN_DATE, DO_CLOSE_DATE,DO_PP,DO_NOWPP,DO_DETAIL,DO_OPT_GENDER,DO_OPT_AGE,DO_STATUS, MEMBER_PH,MEMBER_PHOTO,DO_IMG_NAME from KENDO k, Member m, DO_IMG d where k.host_num = m.member_num and k.do_num = d.do_num and k.DO_NUM = #{doNum}

select * from ( select rownum rn,
from (select
from cashin order by CASHIN_DAYS desc)) where rn >= #{startRow} and rn <= #{endRow} and CASHIN_STATUS = 'complete'

select BUY_NUM, b.DO_NUM, b.PAY_NUM, b.HOST_NUM, b.GOODS_NUM, c.COMPANY_NUM, company_name, GOODS_NAME, DO_NAME, b.MAP_L_NUM, b.MAP_M_NUM, b.MAP_S_NUM, b.THEME_L_NUM, b.THEME_M_NUM, b.THEME_S_NUM, BUY_QTY, BUY_START_DATE, BUY_END_DATE, BUY_DAYS, BUY_PRICE, do_open_date from BUYBUY b, company c, kendo kd, goods g where b.company_num = c.company_num and b.do_num = kd.do_num and b.goods_num = g.goods_num and (do_status = 'doend' or do_status = 'cashcomplete') order by do_open_date desc

select CASHIN_NUM, cashin.PAY_NUM, cashin.COMPANY_NUM, CASHIN_TOTAL_PRICE, CASHIN_COMMISSION, CASHIN_BALANCE, CASHIN_DAYS, CASHIN_MONTH, CASHIN_STATUS from cashin cashin, company com where cashin.company_num = com.company_num and CASHIN_STATUS = 'complete' and com.company_name = #{comName} order by CASHIN_DAYS desc

select BUY_NUM, b.DO_NUM, b.PAY_NUM, b.HOST_NUM, b.GOODS_NUM, c.COMPANY_NUM, company_name, GOODS_NAME, DO_NAME, b.MAP_L_NUM, b.MAP_M_NUM, b.MAP_S_NUM, b.THEME_L_NUM, b.THEME_M_NUM, b.THEME_S_NUM, BUY_QTY, BUY_START_DATE, BUY_END_DATE, BUY_DAYS, BUY_PRICE, do_open_date from BUYBUY b, company c, kendo kd, goods g where b.company_num = c.company_num and b.do_num = kd.do_num and b.goods_num = g.goods_num and company_name = #{comName} and (do_status = 'doend' or do_status = 'cashcomplete') order by do_open_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into cashin (CASHIN_NUM, PAY_NUM, COMPANY_NUM, CASHIN_TOTAL_PRICE, CASHIN_COMMISSION, CASHIN_BALANCE, CASHIN_DAYS, CASHIN_MONTH, CASHIN_STATUS) select 'CI'||CASHIN_NUM_SEQ.nextval, b.PAY_NUM, b.COMPANY_NUM, BUY_PRICE, 0.5, BUY_PRICE*0.5, to_char(trunc(add_months(BUY_END_DATE, + 1),'mm') ,'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), BUY_END_DATE, 'complete' from BUYBUY b, company c, kendo kd where b.company_num = c.company_num and b.do_num = kd.do_num and do_status = 'doend' and company_name = #{comName}
mapper.update: UPDATE kendo k SET k.do_status = 'cashcomplete' WHERE k.do_status = 'doend' and k.do_num = (select b.do_num from buybuy b where b.company_num = (select c.company_num from company c WHERE c.company_name = #{comName}))
UPDATE kendo SET do_status = #{doing} WHERE do_status = 'invited' and DO_CLOSE_DATE <= sysdate
UPDATE kendo SET do_status = #{doend} WHERE do_status = 'doing' and DO_END_DATE <= sysdate
mapper.select: select GOODS_NUM, MAP_L_NUM, MAP_M_NUM, MAP_S_NUM, THEME_L_NUM, THEME_M_NUM, THEME_S_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DETAIL, GOODS_DANGER, GOODS_STATUS, GOODS_STOCK, g.COMPANY_NUM, company_name, REG_DATE from GOODS g, company c where g.COMPANY_NUM = c.COMPANY_NUM and GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName}

select DO_NUM, k.HOST_NUM, DO_NAME, DO_START_DATE, DO_END_DATE, DO_OPEN_DATE, DO_CLOSE_DATE, DO_PP, DO_NOWPP, DO_DETAIL, DO_OPT_GENDER, DO_OPT_AGE, DO_STATUS, MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_PH,MEMBER_PHOTO from kendo k, member m where k.HOST_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM and DO_NAME = #{doName}

select k.DO_NUM,g.GOODS_NUM,c.COMPANY_NUM,company_NAME,GOODS_NAME,DO_IMG_NAME, b.MAP_L_NUM,b.MAP_M_NUM,b.MAP_S_NUM,b.THEME_L_NUM,b.THEME_M_NUM, b.THEME_S_NUM,BUY_DAYS from KENDO k, company c, buybuy b, goods g,do_img dimg where k.do_num = b.do_num and b.goods_num = g.goods_num and g.company_num = c.company_num and k.do_num = dimg.do_num and k.DO_NUM = #{doNum1}
